/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. Bare trees stand sentinel along the street, their leafless branches reaching out into the sky. The sky itself is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding texture to the background. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
